Name: Paul Malan
Comment: Weird that this isn't available by default -- along with the ability to add hidden fields to a form. Needlessly complicated working around this!

Name: Zack Olivas
Comment: I would like to add to this:Dynamically set form field with url parameters.Example:Hidden field ID: utm_campaignURL: www.yourwebsite.com/?utm_campaign=big%20eventUpon loading the page the hidden field will be populated with: "big event"
